subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5588 is on the way
description_text:
Hello. This took too long to ship and I won't be home for about 2 months.
Can I change the delivery address to the shipment? If so, I would like for
it to go to

Aloft Hotel
951 E Playa Del Norte Dr,
Room 432
Tempe, AZ 85288

conversations.body_text: Hi Dinnelky Tavarez,    We regret to inform you that we are unable to modify the delivery address after your order has been shipped. Your package is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. We apologize for any inconvenience and are unable to make further address changes.
